faq.title: Everything You Need to Know
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about Hooshpod's AI agents and platform capabilities.

q1.q: What is Hooshpod and how does it work?
q1.a: Hooshpod is an AI platform that creates specialized agents for different industries. Our agents are trained on industry-specific data and can handle complex workflows like compliance monitoring, procurement optimization, and customer service automation. The platform uses advanced language models with low-latency GPU infrastructure to provide real-time, intelligent responses.

q2.a: We support multiple industries including healthcare, aviation, shipping, procurement, compliance, and administrative services. Each agent is specifically trained for its industry domain with relevant data, regulations, and best practices to ensure accurate and contextually appropriate responses.

q3.q: How secure is my data with Hooshpod?
q3.a: Security is our top priority. We implement enterprise-grade security measures including end-to-end encryption, GDPR compliance, regional data sovereignty controls, and comprehensive audit trails. All data processing follows strict privacy protocols, and we offer on-premises deployment options for sensitive environments.

q4.q: Can I customize agents for my specific needs?
q4.a: Absolutely! Our platform allows extensive customization of agents. You can train agents on your specific data, adjust their behavior and responses, integrate with your existing systems, and create custom workflows. Our no-code builder makes it easy to configure agents without technical expertise.

q5.q: What's the difference between Hooshpod and generic AI assistants?
q5.a: Unlike generic AI assistants, Hooshpod agents are purpose-built for specific industries and use cases. They understand industry terminology, regulations, and workflows. Our agents are trained on specialized data and can handle complex, multi-step processes that generic assistants cannot manage effectively.

q6.q: How do I get started with Hooshpod?
q6.a: Getting started is simple! Contact our team to schedule a demo where we'll assess your needs and show you how Hooshpod can solve your specific challenges. We'll help you choose the right agents, set up integrations, and provide training for your team. Most implementations are up and running within 2-4 weeks.

q7.q: What kind of ROI can I expect?
q7.a: Our clients typically see 20-40% efficiency gains within the first 3 months. This comes from reduced manual work, faster response times, improved accuracy, and better resource allocation. We provide detailed analytics to track your ROI and can help you optimize your agents for maximum impact.

q8.q: Do you offer support and training?
q8.a: Yes! We provide comprehensive onboarding, training sessions for your team, 24/7 technical support, and regular check-ins to ensure your agents are performing optimally. Our success team works closely with you to maximize the value of your AI investment.
